Items.description:
Blance the Glow: Care for Oily Skin

Oily skin deserves care that refines, not restricts. The key is balance. We have carefully curated a routine that will keep your natural radiance while minimizing excess shine. This includes purifying face washes that gently clear buildup and refresh your complexion. Included are some light, oil-free serums that will nourish the skin without heaviness, and a hydrating moisturizer completes your routine. ENJOY!
Items.title: Cerave Foaming Cleanser

Items.description: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser features ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide, and is formulated to help maintain your skinâ€™s protective barrier, lock in moisture, and calm your skin.
Items.title: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%

Items.description: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% serum is a water-based formula that delivers multiple niacinamide benefits to enhance skin brightness, improve texture, and strengthen the skin's moisture barrier. This serum with niacinamide (vitamin B3) contains a high concentration (10%) as well as Zinc PCA to target dullness, uneven texture, and excess oil. Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% also helps reduce the appearance of pores and instantly boosts skin radiance.
Items.title: Cerave Moisturising Lotion

Items.description: This CeraVe Moisturising Lotion 236ml is a lightweight formula designed for both the face and body, providing immediate and sustained hydration for up to 24 hours. Enriched with three essential ceramides (1, 3, and 6-ii) and Hyaluronic Acid, it works to restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier while helping the skin retain its natural moisture.
Items.title: La Roche Posay Anthelios Uv

Items.description: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Uvmune Flu Id SPF50+ 50ml offers ultimate protection to help guard against UV induced damage, including ultra-long UVA rays. This very high protection sunscreen is ultra-resistant, making it suitable for use during activities involving water, sweat, or sand. The texture is invisible, lightweight, non-greasy, and has been developed to avoid eye stinging.
Items.title: La Roche Posay Lipikar Balm Apm

Items.description: La Roche-Posay, a pioneer in microbiome science, has developed LIPIKAR Balm AP+M with a new formula that restores the skin barrier function. This balm provides immediate soothing, reduces the frequency of dry skin flare-ups, and helps to rebalance the skin's microbiome. It offers up to 48 hours of hydration, effectively reducing itching sensations caused by dry skin for long-lasting comfort.
Items.title: La Roche Posay Lipikar Balm

Items.description: The Physiological Micellar Solution acts as a fresh cleansing solution and make-up remover in one, for face and eyes. It is a gentle cleanser which removes make-up and eliminates impurities in one step. It is specifically formulated for all types of sensitive skin. Instructions: Use morning and/or evening. Soak a cotton pad with the purifying micellar water and use it to clean the face and neck.
picUrl: https:/La Roche Posay Effaclar Micellar Water
Items.title: La Roche Posay Effaclar Foaming

Items.description: The La Roche-Posay Effaclar Foaming Gel is a high-tolerance foaming cleanser ideal for managing oily and blemish-prone skin. Its formula gently purifies the skin while effectively eliminating excess oil. Key ingredients include Zinc PCA, which helps reduce sebum production and offers anti-bacterial properties, and Thermal Spring Water to soothe and calm the skin.
Items.title: La Roche Posay Effaclar Foaming Gel
